(cha:installation)=
# Installation

This template uses the latest versions of the following:

 *  sphinx 4.2.0
 *  sphinx-book-theme 1.0.1
 *  python 3.9.7
 *  myst-parser 0.18.1          &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; *if using rst*
 *  nbsphinx 0.9.2
 *  sphinxcontrib-bibtex 2.5.0

 Use `conda install` or `pip install`.
